mapper.insert: INSERT INTO role (id, name, sign, description) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{sign}, #{description})

INSERT INTO role (id, name, sign, description) VALUES
(#{role.id}, #{role.name}, #{role.sign}, #{role.description})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, sign, description FROM role WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT r.id r_id, r.name r_name, r.sign r_sign, r.description r_description, p.id p_id, p.name p_name, p.sign p_sign, p.description p_description, FROM role r LEFT JOIN role_permission rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE r.id = #{id}
